title: Hero city worker risks life, saves 10-year-old girl from sex predator
itunes:title: Hero city worker risks life, saves 10-year-old girl from sex predator
description:
Two Louisiana hero workers helped save a young girl from a registered sex offender. Sanitation worker Dion Merrick called police after he noticed a car matching the description and license plate of a vehicle listed in the AMBER Alert. The silver sedan was parked in a secluded field , but still visible from the road where he was working,. When police arrived, they found the 10-year-old girl inside the vehicle with a 33-year-old sex offender. Nancy Grace speaks with Dion Merrick.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
